critique: This document is an executive order regarding the establishment and management of the Charles Sheldon Antelope Range. It revokes a previous order, withdraws land from settlement, and sets it aside for wildlife conservation, grazing, and mineral resource development. It establishes joint jurisdiction between the Secretaries of the Interior and Agriculture for wildlife and the Secretary of the Interior for grazing lands. The order prioritizes the sustenance of antelope and other wildlife while also allowing for domestic livestock grazing. It also addresses the conservation of migratory birds and other wildlife by the Department of Agriculture.
